trans-unit.source: Represents a placeholder (bookmark) within an event stream.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件資料流中的預留位置 (書籤)。

trans-unit.source: You can use the placeholder to mark a position and return to this position in a stream of events.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用預留位置 (Placeholder) 來標記位置 (Position)，並返回事件資料流中的這個位置 (Position)。

trans-unit.source: An instance of this object can be obtained from an <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord" /> object, in which case it corresponds to the position of that event record.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件的執行個體可以從 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventRecord" /> 物件取得，在這種情況下，它會對應至該事件記錄的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object that contains the information required to serialize the new <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 物件，包含將新的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark" /> 物件序列化所需的資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> object that contains the source of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 物件，包含與新 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark" /> 關聯之序列化資料流的來源。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark" /> class from the specified <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> and <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 執行個體，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventBookmark" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: 要填入資料的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object with the data required to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: 將序列化目標物件所需要的資料填入 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 物件中。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: 要填入資料的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: 將序列化目標物件所需要的資料填入 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 物件中。
